title: Alistar's Passive just feels incredibly lackluster.
body:
Honestly half the time i honestly forget he even has one unless i am specifically looking for it.

Is there any way he can maybe get his passive looked at to be a bit more interactive or at least changed to something that is not a 3 second mini AOE damage ring thats completely forgettable.

replies.body: they should make it so his passive scales of a small portion of his HP and not just AP.

> [{quoted}](name=ready for combat,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=tcPVP17R,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-04-20T07:08:59.958+0000)
>
> they should make it so his passive scales of a small portion of his HP and not just AP.

Anything i feel would be better than what he currently has.

Honestly his passive feels like something that would be amazing in the jungle except thats exactly where Rito doesn't want him and have specifically targeted nerfs at jungle alistar.
Making this change can turn the damage more noticeable, its a good change

yea but we don't really need cow to have a ton of damage. I would rather see something that fits in with his whole powerful Minotaur with insane CC theme he has going rather than just "Angry Cow Radiate anger"

Alistar's passive has been changed many, many times
Used to be passive bonus hp
then it was % bonus damage and damage reduction on structures
then they took out the damage reduction on structures because jungle alistar ganks were getting stupid
